p: This page explains what needs to be done to migrate the SML from the old BRZ operated domain to the new DG DIGIT operated domain. This document tries to explain the requirements in a general manner but will focus on the CIPA e-Delivery implementation for the technical details.
div: Note: inside this document the term SML represents the production SML and the term SMK represents the publically available test version of the SML which should not be used in production.
